description:
Regular League Match
Samantha Sin
The Python
5'4
Lifetime record (1-2)
Lightweight 120lbs
Ranked 11th
Sarah Jane Ceylon
Blondie
5'6
Lifetime record (1-5)
Featherweight 109 lbs
Ranked 13th
Samantha Sin is the rookie. In just her first year she shows great promise as a future contender. She is hoping to improve her rankings going into the Summer Vengeance Tournament that starts June 2nd.
Samantha hopes to over come the veteran, there is nothing like fucking an experienced wrestler, when your the new girl.
Sarah Jane Ceylon is wrestling in her 7th match, she is hoping her experience will turn the flow of the match to her favor. Sarah thinks she should be higher ranked, and is upset the rookie is two ranks ahead of her. Today Sara wants to put Samantha in her place.
Join today for non-scripted, real wrestling. With Stats and history of all the wrestlers.
title: Samantha Sin "The Python" (1-2)
